ch.bfh.ti.gravis.gui.popup

Interface IGraphItemMenuListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CreateVertexMenu, DeleteEdgeMenuItem, DeleteVertexMenuItem, EdgePropertyMenuItem, EndVertexCheckBox, StartVertexCheckBox, VertexPropertyMenuItem

    public interface IGraphItemMenuListener
    Popup menu items can implement this interface and receives information about the current graph item and the graph item location.
    Author:
    Patrick Kofmel (kofmp1@bfh.ch)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setGraphItem(IGraphItem item)
      Sets the current graph item.
      void setGraphItemLocation(Point2D point)
      Sets the current graph item location.
